      GenThreadsNextGeneration(int numOfThreads, Cell[][] other)

      • GenThreadsNextGeneration

        public GenThreadsNextGeneration(int numOfThreads,
                        Cell[][] other)
        This constructor initializes the "first" and "last" array, copies other in first, creates the threads and waits their finish. Copies the temporary array into first.
        Parameters:
        numOfThreads - is the number of threads used for the operations.
        other - is the array of current cell's array.

        Parameters:
        numOfThreads - is the number of threads used for this method.
        Returns:
        returns the threads ready for working.
